mapper.select: SELECT 일련번호 AS participant_serial_number, 등록일 AS participant_registration_date, 지점 AS participant_branch, 전담자 AS participant_counselor, 참여자 AS participant_participant, 모집경로 AS participant_recruitmentPath, 참여유형 AS participant_participationType, 집단여부 AS participant_groupParticipation, 집단시작일 AS participant_groupStartDate, 집단종료일 AS participant_groupEndDate, 학교명 AS participant_schoolName, 전공 AS participant_major, 주민등록번호 AS participant_ssn, 실업급여종료일 AS participant_unemploymentBenefitEndDate, 연락처_1 AS participant_contact1, 연락처_2 AS participant_contact2, 실업급여대상 AS participant_unemploymentBenefitTarget, 실업급여시작일 AS participant_unemploymentBenefitStartDate, 가산점대상 AS participant_priorityTarget, 취업역량 AS participant_jobCompetency, 구직만료일 AS participant_jobSearchExpiryDate, 진행단계 AS participant_currentStage, 초기상담경과개월_A AS participant_initialCounselingElapsedMonths, 초기상담일 AS participant_initialCounselingDate, 최근상담일 AS participant_recentCounselingDate, 미사종료일 AS participant_misaEndDate, 취소종료일 AS participant_cancelEndDate, 이관종료일 AS participant_transferEndDate, 중단종료일 AS participant_suspensionEndDate, IAP수립일 AS participant_iapEstablishmentDate, 프로그램 AS participant_program, [3단계진입일] AS participant_step3EntryDate, 기간만료예정일 AS participant_expiryDate, 클리닉실시일 AS participant_clinicDate, 희망업무 AS participant_desiredJob, 취창업일 AS participant_employmentEntrepreneurshipDate, 취창업처리일 AS participant_employmentEntrepreneurshipProcessingDate, 취업유형 AS participant_employmentType, 퇴사일 AS participant_resignationDate, 취업처 AS participant_companyEmployed, 임금 AS participant_salary, 직무 AS participant_occupation, [3대면] AS participant_faceToFace3, [160만원이상] AS participant_above160k, 성공금제외 AS participant_excludeBonus, 내일채움공제 AS participant_futureSavingPlan, 은행명 AS participant_bankName, 예금주 AS participant_accountHolder, 계좌번호 AS participant_accountNumber, 메모 AS participant_notes, 제유사유 AS participant_exclusionReason, 마감 AS participant_closure, 연락처 AS participant_contact FROM dbo.J_상담;

SELECT 일련번호 AS participant_serial_number, 등록일 AS participant_registration_date, 지점 AS participant_branch, 전담자 AS participant_counselor, 참여자 AS participant_participant, 모집경로 AS participant_recruitmentPath, 참여유형 AS participant_participationType, 집단여부 AS participant_groupParticipation, 집단시작일 AS participant_groupStartDate, 집단종료일 AS participant_groupEndDate, 학교명 AS participant_schoolName, 전공 AS participant_major, 주민등록번호 AS participant_ssn, 실업급여종료일 AS participant_unemploymentBenefitEndDate, 연락처_1 AS participant_contact1, 연락처_2 AS participant_contact2, 실업급여대상 AS participant_unemploymentBenefitTarget, 실업급여시작일 AS participant_unemploymentBenefitStartDate, 가산점대상 AS participant_priorityTarget, 취업역량 AS participant_jobCompetency, 구직만료일 AS participant_jobSearchExpiryDate, 진행단계 AS participant_currentStage, 초기상담경과개월_A AS participant_initialCounselingElapsedMonths, 초기상담일 AS participant_initialCounselingDate, 최근상담일 AS participant_recentCounselingDate, 미사종료일 AS participant_misaEndDate, 취소종료일 AS participant_cancelEndDate, 이관종료일 AS participant_transferEndDate, 중단종료일 AS participant_suspensionEndDate, IAP수립일 AS participant_iapEstablishmentDate, 프로그램 AS participant_program, [3단계진입일] AS participant_step3EntryDate, 기간만료예정일 AS participant_expiryDate, 클리닉실시일 AS participant_clinicDate, 희망업무 AS participant_desiredJob, 취창업일 AS participant_employmentEntrepreneurshipDate, 취창업처리일 AS participant_employmentEntrepreneurshipProcessingDate, 취업유형 AS participant_employmentType, 퇴사일 AS participant_resignationDate, 취업처 AS participant_companyEmployed, 임금 AS participant_salary, 직무 AS participant_occupation, [3대면] AS participant_faceToFace3, [160만원이상] AS participant_above160k, 성공금제외 AS participant_excludeBonus, 내일채움공제 AS participant_futureSavingPlan, 은행명 AS participant_bankName, 예금주 AS participant_accountHolder, 계좌번호 AS participant_accountNumber, 메모 AS participant_notes, 제유사유 AS participant_exclusionReason, 마감 AS participant_closure, 연락처 AS participant_contact FROM dbo.J_상담;
